input.description:
job ID
Numeric ID of the job.

job name
Job name of the job for which this process has been invoked.

job URL
REST URL which points to the exact location of the job in BDA perspective e.g. http://rh53-ma-112.dev.gridapp.com:8088/api/jobs/243

BDA user ID
User who executes or schedules the BDA job.

job description [Optional]
Description for the job as entered by the operator.

change timing [Optional]
Default Value: No Impact

change ID [Optional]
Change ID assigned to the job.

task ID [Optional]
Task ID assigned to the job.

comments [Optional]
Comments contain description for the Change Summary field. This input should be less than 100 characters. Extra characters shall be truncated.
Default Value: Operator Initiated Change

risk level [Optional]
Default Value: Risk Level 2

schedule time [Optional]
Schedule time in case the job has been scheduled to run.
Syntax: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy

Private Key data(for signature mode = key-data) [Optional]
Value specifying the private key in Un-encrypted Base64-encoded PEM format
Example :
--BEGIN PRIVATE KEY---- MIICdQIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCAl8wggJbAgEAAoGBAKomKro6VbW4PeQtUhNzZpSH26vb BTBtH1r4EjnIv4vnhSyyA62ewpROVNn0SpvjoBFwE88HcX3tXym/zbVgtdPke9K+SYHP6CWdiLqn ........ ----END PRIVATE KEY----

Certificate data [Optional] (required when signature mode = key-data)
Value specifying the X509 Certificate (Public Key) in unencrypted Base64-encoded PEM format.
Example :
-BEGIN CERTIFICATE---- MIICdzCCAeCgAwIBAgIFXseN1xYwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEFBQAwUzELMAkGA1UEBhMC VVMxEzARBgNVBAoTCkFtYXpvbi5jb20xDDAKBgNVBAsTA0FXUzEhMB8GA1UEAxMY ........ ----END CERTIFICATE----

Keystore File (required when signature mode = key-files) [Optional]
Specifies the path to the Java Keystore (JKS) containing the client certificate.

Keystore Password (required when signature mode = key-files) [Optional]
Specifies the password of the Java Keystore (JKS)
Private Key file(for signature mode = key-file) Specifies the path to the private key file

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="(string-length(.)>0 and string-length('${task ID}')>0) or (string-length(.)=0 and string-length('${task ID}')=0)"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string(.)='failure'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Invalid inputs: Either both Change and Task IDs should be provided or none</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="2.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="*"> <xsl:element name="{translate(local-name(),'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ','abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')}"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch date}')+500)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="string(number('${epoch date}')+500)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${user id}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Changes> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//change) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//change" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${change}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Changes> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

output.value: Since target/job URL is http. there wont be any ssl parameter.
ssl parameters niether in request and nor in module configuration, so will be picked up from Adapter configuration

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <ssl-parameters> <passphrase>${passphrase}</passphrase> <certificate-data>$[certificate data]</certificate-data> <private-key-data>$[private key data]</private-key-data> <certificate-file>$[certificate file]</certificate-file> <private-key-file>$[private key file]</private-key-file> <keystore-password>$[keystore password]</keystore-password> <alias>$[alias]</alias> <keystore-file>$[keystore file]</keystore-file> <use-ssl-certificate>${ssl certificate}</use-ssl-certificate> <allow-unsigned-certificate>${unsigned certificate}</allow-unsigned-certificate> <install-certificate>${install certificate}</install-certificate> <signature-mode>${signature mode}</signature-mode> </ssl-parameters> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <ssl-parameters> <passphrase> <xsl:value-of select="//passphrase/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </passphrase> <certificate-data> <xsl:value-of select="//certificate_data/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </certificate-data> <private-key-data> <xsl:value-of select="//private_key_data/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </private-key-data> <certificate-file> <xsl:value-of select="//certificate_file/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </certificate-file> <private-key-file> <xsl:value-of select="//private_key_file/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </private-key-file> <keystore-password> <xsl:value-of select="//keystore_password/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </keystore-password> <alias> <xsl:value-of select="//alias/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </alias> <keystore-file> <xsl:value-of select="//keystore_file/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </keystore-file> <allow-unsigned-certificate> <xsl:value-of select="//allow_unsigned_certificate/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </allow-unsigned-certificate> <install-certificate> <xsl:value-of select="//install_certificate/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </install-certificate> <use-ssl-certificate> <xsl:value-of select="//use_ssl_certificate/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </use-ssl-certificate> <signature-mode> <xsl:value-of select="//signature_mode/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </signature-mode> </ssl-parameters> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">
  <xsl:output indent="no" />
  <xsl:template match="/">
    <value>
      <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Job ID: ${ID}
Job name: ${name}
BDA target URL: ${target}
Job description: ${desc}
Schedule time: ${schedule time}</xsl:text>
    </value>
  </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success}'='success'"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${user id}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket updated successfully</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="'${success status}'='invalid'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ITSM ticket credentials are not valid</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)!='success' and string(.)!='failure'"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='true'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='invalid'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">2</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This process creates or updates a change based on the presence of a change ticket ID for a given BDA Patch, Provision or Script action job.
